amendment.description: Amendment earmarks $30 million in the bill to fund activities authorized by the Victims of Trafficking and Violence Protection Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 34 printed in the Congressional Record to earmark a total of $30 million of the bill's funds from various accounts to protect and assist victims of trafficking in persons; and to help countries meet minimum standards for the elimination of such trafficking.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 427 - 0 (Roll no. 265).
